abstract: Hot topics this week included the helicopter crash in the East River, the end of the Yankees' season, the death of Steve Jobs and Occupy Wall Street's parodists.
snippet: Hot topics this week included the helicopter crash in the East River, the end of the Yankees' season, the death of Steve Jobs and Occupy Wall Street's parodists.
lead_paragraph: Perhaps they had this coming - those denizens of Twitter who cheered so forcefully for the Red Sox demise that they scarcely saw the Yankees' downfall coming. Maybe the fans let their guard down, if only a touch, when the bane of the Twitter-verse, A.J. Burnett, pitched effectively Tuesday night to keep the season alive in the face of a 2-1 playoff series deficit against the Detroit Tigers.
